str2: Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To provoke to anger, exasperate. From para and orgizo; to anger alongside, i.e. Enrage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To nourish, nurture, bring up. From ek and trepho; to rear up to maturity, i.e. to cherish or train.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From paideuo; tutorage, i.e. Education or training; by implication, disciplinary correction.
A warning, admonition, counsel. From nous and a derivative of tithemi; calling attention to, i.e. mild rebuke or warning.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
